description: Front-wheel drive sedan class C. The official premiere of the twelfth generation took place simultaneously at the American Carmel-by-Sea and at the China International Salon in Guangzhou on November 16, 2018.
overview: The exterior of the new Corolla Sedan is made in the same style as the other two versions - a hatchback and a station wagon. However, the sedan looks more solid and more prestigious. There is no extra sportiness and some kind of aggression in it as in those two. This is the merit of the unique front end with different bumpers, optics, fenders, hood and relief stern. However, something has been preserved from the previous generation, for example, the length of the wheelbase of 2700 mm, which makes the sedan still one of the most spacious in the class.

specifications.name: Engine capacity(l):
specifications.hint: Engine capacity refers to the volume swept by all the pistons of an engine, within their bores, from the top to the bottom of their travel.

specifications.name: Horse power(hp):
specifications.hint: Horsepower (hp) is a unit of measurement of power, or the rate at which work is done, usually in reference to the output of engines or motors.

specifications.name: Torque(Nm):
specifications.hint: Torque is a twisting force that speaks to the engine's rotational force and measures how much of that twisting force is available when an engine exerts itself.
